duties_responsibilities.duty: Learn tasks associated with PCB and systems assembly based on above levels.
Operate automatic and semi-automatic equipment as required.
Maintain a clean work environment and follow all company policies and practices regarding safety and material handling.
Complete process control charts used to monitor efficiency.
Identify quality, material, and process problems and communicate to proper personnel.
Assist with line changeover and hazardous waste handling duties.
Mentor and assist lesser qualified operators.
Troubleshoot, evaluate, and correct minor machine problems.
Maintain continuous flow of repairing bad feeders to maintain machine operation.
